Package main.java.neat.functions

Class AggregationFunction

java.lang.Object
main.java.neat.functions.AggregationFunction
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public abstract class AggregationFunction
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
An abstract class defining aggregation functions for neural network nodes. Aggregation functions determine how a node combines its input values into a single output value before applying the activation function.
Author:
Taher Joudeh
See Also:
Serialized Form

  • Method Details

    • getAggregationFunction

      public static final AggregationFunction getAggregationFunction​(AggregationFunction.AGGREGATION_FUNCTION aggregationFunction)
      Factory method to get an aggregation function instance based on the specified type.
      Parameters:
      aggregationFunction - the type of aggregation function to create
      Returns:
      concrete implementation of the specified aggregation function
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if an unknown aggregation function type is requested

      public abstract double aggregate​(double[] x)
      Aggregates an array of input values into a single output value.
      Parameters:
      x - array of input values to be aggregated
      Returns:
      the aggregated result
